title: CAI-Based Instructional Design for Advanced Database System Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Core relational database concepts, foundational SQL syntax, and data modeling comprehension
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices, designed with a practical focus considering workplace application

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain database normalization theory with over 90% accuracy through the CAI system
Learners acquire the ability to write 20 or more advanced SQL queries through tutorial-based practice
Learners achieve an 85% or higher correct answer rate in real-time problem-solving applying the drill-and-practice model
Learners can apply database performance optimization techniques to real-world cases in team projects

resources: Virtual Machine Image for Database Practice

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
